review_text:
I HIGHLY recommend the College Town Cottage, to everyone. Very clean & cutest place.
Host is very kind and responsive. I’ll definitely be staying here again!

Stayed a few busy days to move out our college kids for the summer, so this place was a nice peaceful, and private oasis to come back to and relax each night. Quiet, cozy and spotless. East to get in and out. Great instructions for check in and in general. Responsive host and loved the little gift and sweets when we checked in. Overall a very pleasant and enjoyable stay.
Excellent location for visiting Pullman. Very roomy apartment, with all the necessary amenities. Beautiful decor and treats upon arrival made it special.

If you are planning a stay in Pullman or Moscow, this is a perfect spot if there is just a few of you. Everything you need is close by and the hosts are very helpful. It was clean, quiet, and very home like. We would recomend this spot to all our friends. Great job guys .... thanks for the wonderful stay! ~The Wilson's~

The cottage is immaculate, cozy, beautifully appointed, and with comfortable beds! You'll be very pleased should you stay. We came for our last kids commencement and I wish I'd found Annies cottage much sooner. Not enough stars to accurately describe.

Super cute and SO comfortable! I actually slept in a bed that wasn’t mine. I loved that our host was right next door, very friendly and helpful. I felt very safe and relaxed at the cottage, in the neighborhood, on the WSU campus, and in the town of Pullman. Delightful experience altogether!

One of the best Airbnb I have ever lived. It gave me a feeling of back to home and it has everything I need. The surrounding is also really good. Will definitely recommend all my friends to live here if they want to come to Pullman.

This place was absolutely fantastic, it really captured the feeling of being home even though I was there for less than a week! Beautiful, cozy and clean. And the hosts could not have been better. They were the type of people I would love to have as neighbors, friendly, respectful and super helpful. Thank you so much!
Enjoyed our stay very much. It was very comfortable and cozy.

The home was meticulously well kept. We were very impressed by how pristine it was - its classic architectural design, as well as the updated amenities. It is conveniently located within walking distance to downtown and our hosts’ recommendations were very much appreciated. They truly are super hosts. We would love to stay there again the next time we’re in town. Thanks for making us feel so welcome.
Great place, I would gladly stay there again!

Came to Pullman to tour WSU. The house was so comfortable and welcoming. It had everything we needed. The coffee was so good in the morning. It was fairly cold so we didn’t get to use the backyard but it looked like a great place to hang out.
Everything was perfect. Great house, hope to stay there again.

I liked the charm of the place quite a lot. Both me and the fella I'm rooming with have full size crew cab long bed trucks. This Is really not a good place for these types of vehicles. Very narrow and tight getting in the driveway with no street parking near the home. Just something to be aware of, otherwise pretty good acomodations.
Great place to stay! Clean, close to downtown which helped maximize our time in Pullman!

Annie was extremely helpful and responsive, and her place was homey and spotless. We stayed with our two young daughters and the place was perfect. We plan on staying there again the next time we visit Pullman. Thanks Annie!
Super clean place!
This home is beautifully remodeled while retaining its historic charm! Very comfortable. Loved the fireplace. Detailed instructions were very helpful.

I have stayed with Annie more than once. This was my first time in the larger unit of the house. I recommend this stay highly. All the amenities of home. Comfortable. Clean and updated While still maintaining the charm of the older home.

Beautiful comfortable home. Absolutely perfect. So close to see the amazing farm lands in Palouse.
Thank you for providing us a comfortable place to stay.
Clean, hospitable, nice, cute, cozy house! Great hosts - very accommodating and responsive. Would definitely stay again!
Perfect home away from home. Easy and close location to WSU.
Great place!

Came for a quick work trip and this place did not disappoint. Normally we stay at a hotel close to the university but they were booked out. Coming back I’d rather choose this option as it was even less expensive! The house could not have been cuter and being on a tight timeline the fact that we didn’t have to complete chores upon departure was really great!
Very thoughtful renovation. Very clean and comfortable. We especially appreciated the good mattresses, pillows, and linens. Would definitely stay here again.
As always, an outstanding place to stay!!!
The cottage house was wonderful and Javan and Annie were very helpful and responsive. Would highly recommend staying here if you are in Pullman.

Lovely home! Comfortable, spacious, and relaxing! Simple to find, smooth and easy check in and quiet. Annie was gracious and friendly, always communicating promptly through messaging. The beds were soft, clean, and very comfortable. We found the location very nice- within driving distance to the University. Would recommend.

We love Annie's place so much that we have made it our "home away" from home when we visit our grandson in Pullman! It is a refreshing moment to open the door and see the beautiful home waiting for our stay! Always clean, responsive hosts and I love that they added local recommendations for our stay this time! We will be back!

Annie's absolutely deserves more than five stars. It's charming inside and out. The house is roughly the same age as my 87-year-old mother, who tends to speak without filter these days. But even she had only kind things to say, offering, "I could live here!" My husband and I agree it would be a sweet place to call home. Thank you. You've created a gem.
Beautiful home. Very clean nicely appointed and would stay here again.
Another great stay. Very comfotable, clean and relaxing. It was extremely hot in Pullman (close to 100 degrees f) but the A/C kept us feeling just right!
Great place. Super cute and clean. Wish we could’ve stayed longer will definitely be back.
Great, quaint home. We loved it

Annie's place was ideal for our WSU and University of Idaho visits. So much better than local hotels. Great location, incredibly clean, well stocked, good parking situation, pretty grounds and Annie was friendly and responsive. We will definitely book again when we are back to visit.
We’ve stayed here twice and will probably stay here again. Nice location, good amenities, and just what we need.
Wish we could have stayed longer. A lovely place! Very clean, comfortable and quiet with lots of nice finishing touches. Would happily stay here again.

The home is idyllic, perfectly clean and well-stocked with just about everything you’d want in your own home—and all of great quality. Annie and Javad are amazing hosts, very personable, responsive, accommodating, and attentive to whatever needs arise. We stayed for a month and it felt like we had great neighbors; although they are around for a friendly hand waive or if you need assistance, they are not intrusive and give you your privacy. We really loved grilling outback with company, the kids played in the fenced-in front yard, and the living room was so cozy with all the best movies and tv-shows available to us. Cooking was easy with all the pots, utensils, spices and condiments, and I loved listening to music with the provided sound system. We felt at home instantly after arriving and were sad to leave. This will always be our first choice place to stay when visiting Pullman from here on out.

State street cottage was a lovely place to stay for our travel weary family. The place was extremely clean, and the beds were extremely comfortable! Overall it was the perfect place for what we needed.
Very comfortable and relaxing stay.

This was our first big trip as a family of four with our infant, so we were a bit nervous about how everything would turn out. Annie and Javad’s place was a highlight of our trip— so peaceful, thoughtfully appointed, and charming. Little details like a few plastic dishes and a fully fenced grass yard made us feel welcome with our young children. There’s also a tot lot nearby. We would definitely stay here again!

One of the cleanest Airbnbs I've ever stayed at which is extremely important to me. Bags of coffee and a nice welcome sign awaited us- just what we needed. The hillside location does pick up noise from the highways below, but with the windows closed it was very quiet.

Kitchen was the most well equipped AirB&B we have ever been to. The place was perfectly clean and spotless! Perfectly quite neighborhood. HVAC system was new and the AC appreciated! There can be nothing negative (zero) to say about this place, as it truly was a good find in a small community…..where I would not have high expectations! We did not use the outside BBQ or fire pit with provided wood, but thought this was a nice amenity.
It also would have been very comfortable for two couples or a family, as the bedrooms are separated by the nicely finished bathroom.

Another great stay at Annie and Javad's place. We come to Pullman often to visit my 106 year old mother-in-law. Staying here feels like home; clean, spacious and comfy. Close to town by car and nice and quiet.
Very nice place and love the chocolate!

Simply wonderful and cozy home, located in a quiet spot. This is a tastefully renovated place featuring squeaky clean interiors, and a nice private backyard with fire pit and BBQ grill. Private parking spot in back is a great plus! Highly recommended for a family getaway.

This lovely cottage is spotlessly clean with two queens and a queen sofa bed. Plenty of extra linens and snuggly blankets. Central air for hot days. It is the main floor, 2 bedroom apartment with an apartment below. Plenty of comfy seating for movie night. Lovely fenced yard, gardens and a back yard fire-pit. Free off-street parking. Safe, quiet neighborhood. Highly recommend!

The house is very clean, well stocked, and charming. The location is easy to find and close to the WSU campus. The hosts were very responsive and the home was spotless. I would absolutely stay here again. The 2 private parking spaces were a nice touch.
Clean, cute, well-appointed place to stay. Will return here next time we go to Pullman.

wonderful place.
we will repeat soon.
What a lovely and clean space. This space was clean, had kitchen basics that you would need, and exactly as described.
My husband and I enjoyed our time in Pullman. We spent a lot of that time at our beautiful Airbnb. It was so comfortable and felt like a home away from home.
This was a wonderful place. It was all lovely and the hosts were very nice!
it was excellent locationvery clean and beds were very comfortable
I always appreciate how clean Annie’s place is, with all needed amenities but not cluttered or overdone.
We had a great stay. The place was clean and very cozy. We felt right at home. We hope to come visit again!
This was a very nice, easy and relaxing stay.
Great stay, beds were comfy, the location was close to everything. Will plan to stay again when visiting my daughter at WSU. Definitely recommend!
This was our 2nd time staying at the State Street Cottage, which we now call “our new home away from home” when visiting Pullman! Thank you again for having a perfect place for us to stay!
Annie's place was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay!
We’ve stayed here 3 times now and always check to see if it’s available when we are planning a trip to Pullman.
Annie and Javad are perfect hosts and their house is welcoming and inviting with everything needed for our stay! We love it!!

We like to stay here when we come visit my MIL, living in a retirement home nearby. It is the main floor of a beautifully restored older home. (Sparate apt below.) Spacious, clean, comfy beds and couch. Nice tv set up, too. It is within minutes driving downtown to shops (Bruised Books, used bookstore is one of our favorites) and grocery stores and restaurants. Close to WSU, too. A few miles further is Moscow, ID with some box stores (Target, Old Navy, Rite Aid) and another one of our favorites, TriState (hardware, camping, garden, kitchen, clothing, etc.) Communication with Annie and Javad is great. They are extremely responsive and live right next door. The whole experience couldn't be easier.
We loved staying here! The house was very clean and cozy, easy to find and the host was very friendly and had great communication with us! We will definitely be back!
the place was super cute and very clean. we had a very nice stay here. very comfortable! thank you!!
Great place to stay!! Loved everything about it! Will definitely stay here again when we are in the area. :)
Very comfortable and clean, thank you!
We absolutely loved our stay! The home is adorable, clean, comfortable, and full of personal touches. Absolutely, hands down recommend that people stay here!!!!

We have stayed in other Air BNB's that seemed nice but upon arrival wasn't great. The State Street Cottage was as advertised! We loved everything about the place! Annie and her husband were great. The State Street Cottage will be our home away from home when visiting Pullman!
Will definitely book here again. Lovely home, comfortable beds, clean, and close to WSU.
My family and I came to this Airbnb for one night to celebrate my sister's birthday. We plan on coming here whenever we visit her again!

We had a short stay however upon arriving, having a parking space on the property was awesome, especially when there is snow in the area. Nice room temperature mud room where you could leave your shoes before entering the house and not have them cold when you leave the house.
The house was warm, cozy, with plenty of lighting. Living room was inviting to sit, read, watch tv, play some games or just take a nap.
Bedrooms were spacious, beds with two different feels to the mattress. The bed in the smaller room was firmer then the master room therefore we slept in the smaller room. Built in closet and shelf space, plenty of linens and great pillows.
Bathroom was spacious and nicely country modern style. I really enjoyed the bath products that were provided (and I always bring my own).
We did not use the kitchen much besides for water but it was well stocked with essential items.
All in all this home was wonderful. I will keep it in my favorites for when we visit Pullman again.

Our stay was perfect. Annie & Javad were so helpful and accommodating. The house is very clean, comfy and we loved the decor and furnishings. Quiet neighborhood and very close to WSU campus. Great place to stay and we would love to come back!

We were there to attend our grand niece’s graduation ceremony at WSU.
This was conveniently located within 5 minutes of the campus. It was clean and cozy with everything you need for a extended stay. Large living room, full kitchen with separate dining room plus 2 bedrooms. All very clean and nicely appointed. There is only one bathroom, so be prepared to schedule it’s use if there are more than 2 persons in your party.

My wife, adult daughters and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this spacious, well-appointed home. Annie and Javad are conscientious hosts and have thought of everything. Easy location for walking downtown.
A quiet, restful stay in a beautifully furnished house. I really enjoyed the decor and large selection of dvds and cds as well.

Annie was very responsive to inquiries. The place was clean and accommodating. There were box fans in the bedrooms, which every listing should have in my opinion. Location was great, close to everything fun to do in town. Only thing missing was a washer and dryer, which I should have double checked the amenities prior if one was going to be needed.
Clean and spacious. A very nice place to stay

Thank you for you kindness
Anna and Dana

The State Street Cottage was beautiful and relaxing and sparkling clean! The location was great for our trips back and forth to the WSU campus. I liked being close to town but being in a more quiet and private location.
So great! Cozy and warm - super dialed in and convenient to everything. I'm looking for reasons to stay there again.
The hosts and house are incredible! Super cute part of town with easy access to everything. Truly spectacular.

If you’re looking for a place to stay in Pullman- this is it! So clean, welcoming, and comfy. We had everything we needed to cook and a great space to spend quality time together. We would definitely recommend! 10/10.
It was better than i had anticipated. Everything was better than the pictures!
We had extra surprise guests and Annie was very helpful. very cleanand comfortable will come again.

Another wonderful stay at Annie and Javad's beautifully refurbished, upstairs floor of a house. We particularly enjoy it's spaciousness, comfy couch and chairs for tv viewing, large dining area, well equipped kitchen (complete with coffee, tea and spices) and nice beds. The heating/cooling system adds to the comfort as well. They really pay attention to detail and.are very responsive. Great hosts.
Fantastic home-very thoughtful touches and super comfortable and clean accommodations. Very well decorated and homey. We really enjoyed staying here and recommend it highly!
This place was so cute I wish I could live there. Everything was perfect and I will definitely stay again. Close enough to Greek Row to enjoy my daughter who lives there!
What a beautiful home! Very comfortable. Having no cleaning fee makes this place really inexpensive

This is a great place and Annie is a wonderful host. She has a tastefully done house, great attention to detail and has a decent stocked kitchen with essentials including Coffee, Tea and basic spices. Great host, Cool place and definitely going back again. Thank Annie
Gorgeous home with all the amenities! Great location by trail and close to downtown.
It was a great stay! The house was so clean, quiet, and centrally located. Absolutely lovely.
Beautiful place to stay. Comfortable and homey.
Wonderful stay. Clean and warm charm to the house. Will stay again.

This home was beautiful, comfy and had everything we needed. Our girls loved all the views looking out from the windows! Our host, Annie was welcoming and provided all the details necessary to help ensure a smooth check-in and stay. If we visit Pullman in the future, we will stay again. Definitely recommend!

Highly recommend! Charming, cozy and very clean cottage home. Very comfortable beds, large dining room with lots of seating. Lots of seating in family room too with large t.v. and access to cable. Kitchen was stocked with lots of amenities and fresh coffee and cream. Really appreciated all the extra touches! Owners did an excellent job of communicating with us and checking in during our stay. A plus rating!
Great place, very comfortable for a quick overnight passing through.

The house is lovely. It is wonderfully appointed and extremely quiet. We were able to stretch The host is an incredible decorator and the home is very inviting. The check-in process was straightforward, and the instructions left behind were specific and easy to follow. the location is also excellent. We loved our stay.

Annie's house was perfect for our family. We were visiting for WSU Orientation for our daughter (she stayed on campus) and there were 4 of us at the house. It had everything we needed and was very nice. We really loved the walkability to restaurants, shops, and even the WSU campus. We hope to stay again.
Beautiful spacious home in a convenient part of town. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
we had a great experience at this place. it made for a very relaxing evening after a weekend of moving from Portland to pullman. Thank you so much everything, it was much better than I had imagined

Lovely cottage in Pullman that we would certainly look to stay at again. The host were very gracious and allowed us some flexibility in things due to having a young child and this meant a lot to us. Very good location in town and easy to get where we wanted quickly.
Great location & nice little house with all the amenities you need.
Annie’s apartment place is decorated very well. It is clean and comfortable and close to town. They communicated well with us . We enjoyed our stay.

Annie’s bungalow was furnished beautifully with everything needed for our stay!! Great communication! We would definitely recommend it to other travelers as their “go to spot” when visiting Pullman!! 5 stars!!

The photos and description don’t do this home justice. It’s even more beautiful in person. Spotlessly clean and very comfortable, really checked every box for our family UI graduation weekend. The well-stocked kitchen was perfect and dining room table to sit around was so nice. Would chose this stay again for sure!
Amazing location for a lovely, spacious accommodation.

We had a fabulous time at the State Street home during graduation weekend. Annie has added many special touches and the kitchen is well stocked with spices, oils and high quality pots & pans. The home is comfortable for 6 people as long as you don’t mind sharing one bathroom, which we didn’t. The house is near the WSU campus. At this time of year there were tulips everywhere. We highly recommend this house.
Wonderful place to rest and relax if you are staying a couple nights in Pullman. Simple easy check in and check out. Cozy on the inside and the outside.
I would recommend this home to anyone needing a place to stay. The hosts are great! The home is clean and very comfortable. Perfect home away from home!
Great place, loved how cozy the living room is. The property owners were quick to respond and made the stay so smooth. Clean and well-maintained. Excellent Stay!

We took a trip to the Palouse for spring break and decided to stay in Pullman. Annie's place was the perfect in-town cottage--small but immaculate, with that "special touch" of coziness and hospitality all over. And an unbeatable price, too! Lastly, note the location which is an easy half-mile walk to the heart of downtown. Highly recommended.
Great place! Awesome communication! Beautiful home. Will definitely book again!
This was our second stay at Annie Airbnb. Everything was perfect. We will come back whenever we visit Pullman. The place is highly recommended for short and long stays.
Really nice place and in a great location. Close to campus and lots of food options. Parking is a bit quirky but it wasn’t an issue at all. Will definitely book again in the future.

We loved our stay in the state street cottage! It was the perfect location, close to everything. The house was so cute!! It had everything we needed from the kitchen, to the bathroom and entertainment. The beds were comfortable and the sheets were so silky soft— combined with blackout curtains made for an excellent night of sleep! The yard was so sweet for our girls to play in and get some sunshine. Annie and Javad were amazing hosts- easy to access if we needed them but also gave us our space. We enjoyed chatting with them in the driveway. Our time in Pullman was so special and we are so grateful for the special space we were able to enjoy!
Great spot close to WSU. Very clean, well put together, and comfortable. I plan to stay again while visiting my kids at school.

We had a great stay... Annie and Javad are super hosts... The house location is the best in Pullman. The house is stuffed and includes every thing needed for a great stay... We decided to come back again for a 3 nights stay within a week of departure...
Lovely place to stay! Homey and very comfortable. Kitchen was great and allowed us yo cook a few meals. Location was super convenient. Will stay again if in the area!
This is a special place. If you need a nice escape in Pullman, you’re in for a treat. So much charm and an incredible host.
Its a charming house with an old feel, we really enjoyed the stay. It afforded us the freedom to spend some needed time with family and feel like we were at home. Can't thank you enough.
Clean, comfortable and a cute place. Perfect for us
perfect location, very clean and comfortable.

What a wonderful place to stay while visiting with my college student. Close to campus, walking distance to restaurants and coffee shops. Very clean, comfortable, and super easy check-in. Definitely plan on staying here again!

We spent a few relaxing days on the upper floor of Annie and Javad's beautifully updated older home. Complete with wood floors and arched doorways, comfy furniture and great entertainment system. We were able to keep up with the winter Olympics on Hulu. Netflix, Amazon and Disney were also available.
The place is within walking distance (up and down a hill) or a quick drive to some good eateries and a grocery store. (Be sure to check out the list of restaurants suggested in the guest instruction book. They know their food!) Highly recommend staying here.
A cozy and very clean cottage. Highly recommend!
A wonderful stay. Great Location, close to WSU. Annie was an amazing host and went out of her way to make our stay comfortable.
This clean, cozy cottage was the perfect place for our family holiday gathering in Pullman. A great location in a quiet neighborhood and Annie & Javad are Superhosts indeed!!
The house was lovely and comfortable!!😊😊

If you are looking for a spotless, well-appointed, quiet & comfortable place to stay, then look no further!
Annie's communication was impeccable, and this Airbnb is close to everything in Pullman. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
What a wonderful place to stay! So darling and close to everything! Love the enclosed heated porch😃. The hosts are amazing too!

This is a great house in a great location. While it was very close to downtown and WSU, it was exceptionally quiet. The house itself is relatively old, but the kitchen and bathroom were updated with modern appliances and fixtures. Annie communicated clearly and promptly, but did not overdo it.

The house was perfect. The furnishings were excellent and everything I would need. If I had any questions they were answered quickly.
I will definitely stay there again!
This is a wonderful stay in a beautifully historic home in Pullman. It was clean and lovely, Annie is a great host!

Annie's air bnb felt more like a home than any other air bnb I have stayed at. The layout, the furniture, the decor, and interior design were so beautiful and comforting and we all felt like we were staying in a place we would call home. would highly recommend to anyone! thanks so much
Wonderful home. Very clean, comfortable, and cozy. Great location also. Can’t recommend enough
Hosts are incredible! Home is perfect with a great location, nice views, and nice furnishing. We enjoyed our stay and will be back

The cottage is bright, quiet, and homey, and it is a short walk from downtown, Conservation Park, and Dissmores grocery. It worked perfectly for the three of us while working virtually for a week, and the wifi held up surprisingly well to multiple simultaneous video calls. We had workstations set up in the dining room, bedroom, and living room, and occasionally used the second bedroom when all three of us were in simultaneous meetings.
Annie's place is very comfortable, cozy and convenient. We would definitely stay here again when we're visiting WSU.

This was a perfectly wonderful home. We were very impressed with how clean it was.
Our beds were very comfortable and we liked how one was soft and one was a bit firmer.
Great location and easy to get to from the heart of Pullman. Being able to have a fire outside in the backyard was a lovely offer. We highly recommend this home!

Looking for a great location to campus….you have found it at this quaint Airbnb…….extremely close to campus, great space for up to 6 people…..nice that there is a full kitchen so if you didn’t want to eat out you could very easily cook!! Annie and Javad were great to work with!!
This is my second time here and its perfect in every way! The host is so attentive but you have your privacy. If there was a higher rating than 5 I would give it this is the best.

Outstanding spot for a visit to Pullman! The house was spotless and comfortable, and a perfect location for visiting campus. We loved sitting out at the fire pit during the evening! We highly recommend staying here.
Darling home. Very clean. Very comfortable.

Best airbnb! We wish all of our airbnb's were like this one. It's spacious, charming, in a fantastic location, and so welcoming. The furniture is truly comfortable (unlike many rentals which look great in the photos but are smaller, cheaper, and not comfortable at all when you get there). Great beds, great bathroom, kitchen, livingroom and diningroom spaces. It's well-appointed with all the amenities we care about, and the house itself has such beautiful architecture and all these fun, original built-in closets and cupboards. I'd live here if I could! The owners are responsive, friendly, and communicative. And this is one of the few airbnb's that's not overpriced. Would DEFINITELY recommend this place.
Great location in town and cozy cottage. Would certainly stay here if we happen to go through Pullman again!

What a great stay. This home has everything you might need. Great location, very clean and lots of room to cook sit at the dining table or relax in the oversized living room. There’s also a cute fire pit with a bbq and lights. I can see why Annie is a super host. There’s no detail missed. We will definitely be back.
Cute cottage, well appointed and close to campus and downtown. Just what we needed on a trip to visit colleges but would work well for a longer stay as well.

This location was super easy to find, a great location for visiting the surrounding area, or going onto WSU campus.
It was clean and fully stocked with all the things we needed.
The outside sitting area was nice and a lovely place to hang out.

This place was perfect in every way! Location was awesome and the interior of the house was well maintained and exactly what I needed. There isn't anything I would change. Annie was a perfect host so much so I booked time to go back in October. I will try to stay here as often as I can when I come to visit my daughter.
This is an awesome place! So clean! Plenty of room to just kick back and relax!

I wish I could leave a bad review so no one else would book weekends at Annie and Javad's place ;) But I can't. They are wonderful hosts. Extremely welcoming, we feel like part of their family when we stay here. Communications is outstanding. Both of their places are comfortable, safe, very clean. You can tell they take pride in hosting. We'll definitely be back, even once our Coug graduates!!

Our family stayed at the State Street cottage while moving our daughter in to WSU. I chose this particular rental because the Air BnB listing photos were so adorable. In person the cottage is even more charming than in the great photos!
The interior decor and furnishings were so pretty and cozy, and the entire cottage was spotless.
We love our game nights and the large dining room table was a perfect place to gather for board games and endless rounds of War. In the living room the comfy couch, chaise lounge, and big basket of throw blankets made for fabulous movie nights. The bedrooms were stocked with plenty of extra pillows and the bathroom had more than enough towels (they were very fluffy- seriously-what kind of magical fabric softener are they using?)
As an avid home “chef” ( I flatter myself), a well-stocked kitchen is a must-have. Our family loves preparing home-cooked meals, even when traveling. The cottage kitchen had everything we needed. It was amazing how the hosts fit so much into a small-ish space. And the spice rack….so many good things in there. Celery salt! Herbs de Provence! I’m a firm believer that you can tell a lot about people by the spices they keep. Our hosts are clearly exemplary individuals.
We had a few questions for our hosts and they were always kind, helpful and immediately responsive (special thanks for not making us feel like jerks for breaking a wineglass…. and for accidentally signing them up for Disney+ while trying to log in to our own account) Best hosts ever. Hopefully we will be able to stay here again during the next few years while we visit our daughter.
We were quite sad to leave Pullman at the end of our stay. Was it because we were leaving our firstborn at college or because we were leaving the perfect, adorable cottage? Hard to say…

This was a perfect place for us to stay while settling a student at WSU into her campus apartment. The location is so convenient. The home is very comfortable and clean. Everything we needed was included. We will definitely stay there again when in Pullman

The State Street Cottage was a beautiful place to stay while we got our daughter settled in to her new home. The home was immaculate and I had everything I needed to prepare great meals. Annie was quick to respond to any questions I had and we’ll definitely be attempting to stay again!

The host were great. She was very attentive and responded very quickly when you a question or problem Very neat, and clean home. Close to campus. Beautiful old home. We loved it. Made our stay to Washington very relaxed.
Great host and nice place

The state street cottage is a lovely place to stay. We were there with our two children and it was very comfortable. The host was a great communicator and quickly responded to all inquires. Check in and check out was a breeze. We would definitely stay again!
We have stayed in many Airbnbs over the years and this is our favorite! We hope to come back soon.
This place rocks! Perfect distance from WSU and the downtown area. Gave us tons of opportunities to walk places to eat. Super clean and spacious! Will be come back :)

Annie's home was perfect for us - it was spacious, spotless, comfortable, and in a great location that made everywhere we wanted to visit on the Palouse super accessible. It was also nice and cool for the hot summer weeks during our visit.
The house is clean, spacious and beautifully decorated. The linens, blankets and towels are soft and plush. A great place to hang out and relax after a long day.
This is a charming, cozy little space close to campus and downtown.
The home exceeded expectations, great interior and great location. Annie is a great host and provides wonderful hospitality. Thank you!
A quiet, clean and comfortable place that easily slept four. Great hosts.
We are very satisfied with this stay. The house is very good, clean and easy to find. Thank you for your guidance
Super clean and comfortable!
Convenient location and a great place to stay

This is a really great place. The owners have made this house into an Airbnb sanctuary, complete with several personal touches. We would definitely recommend this place and look forward to staying again in the future. Kristy was also very easy and responsive to communicate with.
Very clean space in the heart of Downtown Pullman. Kristy is very quick to respond and had everything in order.

Really enjoyed our stay. The house is in a great location and easy walk to campus. Loved all the mid-century modern furniture and decor. The host also had drinks, hummus, crackers, chocolate, spices, butter… and everything we needed!
We had a wonderful stay! Everything was great.
We enjoyed our stay tremendously. The house is a great location if you want to walk to campus.
Very clean, nice and well stocked.

The house was a throwback to the 1950s, in all the best ways. The decor was lovely mid-century modern, and it was everything I hoped it would be. Patrick did an amazing job restoring and furnishing this gem to its 50s glory, down to the 8-track tape player and console stereo. I wish we could have stayed longer.

We had a wonderful stay in Patrick's lovely home. Very comfortable and relaxing. In fact, we spent both evenings at the house rather than going out at night because we enjoyed being there so much.
Very clean and well appointed home. The views from the kitchen, dining room and living room windows were beautiful, especially after the snow fall. It snowed during our arrival and Patrick stopped by to shovel the stairs leading to the front door, which was unexpected and appreciated.
The house is within walking distance of Beasley Coliseum (and the football stadium) which made travel to and from the basketball game very convenient.
Thank you for your hospitality!!
Patricks home was beautiful and nestled into a quiet neighborhood close to the university. He was very accommodating to my group - would stay again!

We actually didn’t get the chance to stay at this AirBnB because Pullman had a major natural gas leak and the house didn’t have hot water or heat this weekend. However, when I contacted Patrick after learning of this issue (prior to traveling to Pullman) he was gracious and helpful and offered us a 100% refund. We’ll reschedule our trip in the spring and see if the house is available, for sure! Thanks Patrick!
Great place to stay! Beautiful fall view and amazing vintage accents you make the trip a memorable experience.
This place was so great that we didn't want to leave and extended our stay for a couple more nights! Would love to return here again.

We really enjoyed Patrick's home. It was quite stylish and very comfortable, and had a lovely view of the neighborhood. Patrick was kind and responsive, and he included some good recommendations in the house guide (who knew there are grizzly bears on view in Pullman???). It was a great place to stay whilst visiting my son at WSU. He was able to escape the dorm for a few nights and enjoy some home cooked meals and sleep in a comfy bed.

Everything about Patrick’s mid-century home was wonderful. The house is spacious, comfortable and has what you need for a great stay. The view is terrific. We really liked how close we were to campus in a very quiet neighborhood. Patrick was very responsive to all my questions. We would definitely stay here again!!!

Fun mid century architecture and furnishings. Lovely view! Lights along the flagstone stairs were helpful. Patrick was responsive and helpful! Nice to be able to walk to campus and not deal with parking.
Perfect location for easy access to RV lots, stadium, and other game day activities.
Terrific place. Great host. Will definitely stay there again!

Fun to step into a 1950s home at Patrick's place. The design is great for gathering to talk, play games or just eat together. Thanks for the extras -- cards, Scrabble, wine, snacks, books -- that helped to make for a comfy stay.
Very pretty house and great location. Definitely worth the price.
Our 2nd time staying here! Cool atmosphere and very clean!
Great place to stay, very close to campus, very responsive host. We hope we can book this place every time we go visit our daughter at WSU.
Patrick’s place made for an incredibly relaxing stay after a cross country drive to Pullman with my dad. Between the decor, space, and amenities, I could t recommend it more!

If we are in Pullman again, we will definitely look to stay here.
This place was wonderful! Felt right at home and comfortable. The location was fantastic, the house itself was nostalgic and gorgeous!
This was a very cute and comfortable home in a quiet neighborhood. It was roomy yet cozy
Charming place! Our host was great and it had everything we could have wanted. Would absolutely book again!

Great stay that felt like walking into my grandparents house (in the best way)- they really embraced the 50's vibe. Great linens. View was terrific. Patrick was a helpful host and terrific communicator. We will be back!

Great stay at Patrick's place. The home was very clean and well set-up.
We loved the MCM theme and related furnishings! We enjoyed our visit and would definitely stay again. Thank you Patrick!

Beautiful home, quiet location, we had a lovely stay. The host proactively reached out to make sure we got in okay. The kitchen had anything and everything we could possibly want to prepare a meal. We would definitely stay here again.

Patrick’s place was fantastic! The home was immaculate and decorated tastefully (an awesome 50’s theme) it was also super comfortable. We enjoyed it immensely! The kitchen was well stocked with every gadget, cooking vessel and utensil you could desire. We especially enjoyed the electric percolator with an amazing coffee blend. Thank you! You made it a wonderful weekend!!

Patrick’s place is spacious, clean and beautifully decorated in the mid-century style.
The expansive windows in the living room let in considerable natural light. Although my visit was during sunny days, I can imagine how effective these windows would be on a cloudy Pullman day.
The kitchen is amply appointed. We (three) did a single load of dishes after 3 nights of stay as we never ran out of plates or silverware.

I hope to return to this nice house.
Loved the mid century modern style and attention to detail. Very clean and comfortable.

Amazing place to stay. I have stayed in many places in the area and this one was fun. It takes you back to the 1950’s. The little details they took the time to incorporate made it more than a 5 star. Very communicable host, lots of ideas for things to do in the area. Comfortable no matter which room you were in. It was stocked well with the little things you may need. Definitely worth every penny and will be booking anytime I am in the area!
Wonderful host, beautiful home!
Great place, loved the retro decor, and super close to campus. My teenage daughter even commented about how cool she thought the house was.
The place looked amazing and Patrick was very helpful with instructions for check in!

The perfect house to visit WSU with my child. The house itself is super-cute, comfortable, and had absolutely everything we needed and more. Thanks Patrick!

A nice surprise! This house was an experience—the retro style was fun! The turntable and games made for relaxing evenings. The host had a basket of treats and wine for us and the beds were so comfortable, that we ordered the same pillows for our house!
This is a very comfortable spot! Thank you!!
Everything was just as advertised! Great place!

Wonderful place to stay with everything you could need. Great location!

Our favorite place to stay while visiting our kids at WSU. The home is beyond charming, spic and span and well stocked with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

This space was amazing!! It was very clean and perfectly organized and described!! The owner communicated quickly and was very accommodating! Amazing location to visit our WSU Coug! The 50’s theme is so fun and aesthetically pleasing! All the amenities worked perfectly and kitchen was well stocked to make our college student a home cooked meal! Will look to stay here again!

This modern mid-century was an amazing stay for us. Nice quiet neighborhood. The view was so nice! We attended a football and volleyball game with easy access to both the stadium and gym. Great location and super clean. Wonderful communication and we would love to return in the future! Such a neat place.

This place is magical!! Patrick responded very quickly whenever I had a question and the entire family was in awe of the house. We did puzzles, cooked a big dinner, listened to music and enjoyed everything the house had to offer that we could get too. Definitely coming back!

Clean, comfortable, and full of Mid-Century Modern character and charm. Visitors will enjoy the retro aesthetic and appreciate how well-appointed the home is - from the complete kitchen to the well-stocked bath products. Great location for visiting campus. This is a 10 out of 10!

We thoroughly enjoyed this place. So close to the university fields, and an amazing view. Other than food, they had everything we needed to cook for the weekend. Very cozy spot to just hang out with family and relax.

You will love staying here. The hosts are so nice, helpful, and quick to reply to messages. The look and feel made my trip even more enjoyable and really made the stay a unique and memorable experience.

We absolutely love this Airbnb. Not only was the style and decor well done with a consistent theme of mid century throughout, it was clean and Patrick and Jenny thought of everything when it came to making us feel at home. Great place to stay 10 minute walk to the stadium. Everything you need for a great game day experience.

Great location to walk to campus and catch a football game. We walked everywhere except Walmart.

The space was clean and inviting, with fresh flowers and snacks aplenty. We slept well and enjoyed the quiet, which was amazing given the fact that it was commencement weekend. If we ever had the occasion to stay in Pullman again, we’d book this property.

Had a great 4 day stay at Cougar Hideaway. The space was clean and tidy. Michelle provided snacks and a few basics that were much appreciated. The location was very close to everything in Pullman. Would stay again while visiting Pullman.
We had a very comfortable stay!
The bed was very comfortable.We will definitely plan on staying there again ☮️.

Michelle's space is welcoming and well situated for visiting Pullman. She is very responsive and clearly cares about hospitality and having a home in the community. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend to friends!
Smooth process, cute place, and perfect for a weekend in Pullman.
What a lovely little place to stay. Comfortable bed and easy access to the room. Very neat and clean. Definitely recommend!!

Sweet little cottage close to campus and downtown. Very quiet neighborhood and zero noise from the adjacent house. The bed and linens felt luxurious. Kitchen was well stocked with breakfast goodies. Grocery store was a short walk. We had a perfect stay!
Amazing stay! A quiet little get away and super close to WSU. The host was great and super responsive! Definitely would stay here again!
It was such a cute little place! The snacks were such a nice touch!
pretty cool little guest house and in an area that is within a close proximity to eating, shopping and WSU campus. The host was very helpful, friendly and responsive. I'd definitely visit again!

Michelle was a great host and I would definitely stay again as well as recommend to others! There were plenty of personal touches, like eggs and bagels provided to get my stay started. Also, the Airbnb was conveniently located.

This was my husband and my’s second time staying at The Cougar Hideaway. It is clean, quiet and comfortable. Michelle has thought of and provides everything to make our stay a pleasant one.
Great location and had everything we needed for a weekend stay. We will be back the next time we are in Pullman.
Lovely little unit. Clean and cute. responsive host. would 100% recommend staying here.

Accurate listing & very cozy, clean and comfortable place.

House was perfect for two. Well stocked and had everything that we could need. The host was excellent and responded quickly to a question we had. The house was comfortable and clean. Mornings we were greeted by a few deer even! We will be staying at this property again.

absolutely loved my stay in the cougar hideaway! it was the perfect size for my boyfriend and i to stay in this weekend. there were very clear instructions for both check-in and check-out. i did forget some items, but i was able to contact the host for retrieval :) definitely planning on coming back in the future!

When I make it back to Pullman again, I'll definitely look to stay here again.
Emma was great about flexible check in time and responded quickly to a TV question. Very charming, clean little house.
Wonderful stay at the cozy house. Short walks to downtown, restaurants, and Washington State University. Comfortable furniture and bedding.

This is a great home and location in Pullman! Emma was such a pleasure, responsive and so helpful. The home was very nice, very clean, and came with everything you could need. Anytime we're back to Pullman we will definitely stay here!

Thank you Emma for taking such care of your guests.

Wow! A great find for our relaxing weekend visiting our college daughter. We loved the mix of old wood with modern touches. We shared lovely, home cooked meals and played many hours of cards. Thank you Emma!

My first time renting an Airbnb, and what an amazing experience. We felt right at home as soon as we got to the charming house. We loved staying at Emma’s place. We came to move my sister in to her dorm at WSU and couldn’t have asked for a better space. Emma communicated perfectly and everything was so simple. This home was perfection. The description and photos were accurate, the home was very clean, and the host was great! The beds were clean and comfy. The bathrooms were beautiful. Absolutely charming and fantastic location! One of the most helpful hosts I have dealt with, Emma is all that is good about Airbnb. I would book with her again and again!
Awesome place in a perfect location - walking distance to everything in downtown Pullman. Would definitely stay here again!

I booked Emma’s place for orientation weekend at WSU for my son and I. The location was perfect, we walked to cafes and the delicious Porch Light Pizza. WSU was a five minute drive. Perfect stay with thoughtful amenities. Finally, Emma is a wonderful host, a lovely card awaited us and she inquired about the best time to take care of a landscaping issue as to ensure it wouldn’t inconvenience us. I had such a wonderful weekend at the McKenzie BnB. The house is clean, comfortable, and cozy with everything needed. It is also a fantastic location! And I love all the improvements and small details throughout the home. I will definitely be back!!!

It was wonderful staying in this very nice Air Bnb while in Pullman. Easy walk to everywhere we needed to go. Very nice accommodations from all the things in the kitchen to the very nice linens and comfy bed. Emma was a lovely host and very responsive. I would 100% recommend to anyone visiting Pullman.

Emma was very responsive. The house was exactly as described. Perfect for our family visit to the area.
My best recommendation is “ I would be very disappointed if I could not stay in Emma’s BB on our next visit.

Emma’s place was all the listing said it would be and then some. Beautiful home that was clean and easy to maneuver. The beds were very comfortable and access to two showers was fantastic. Highly recommend Emma’s spot!
Great house and location in this college town. Very accessible to restaurants, stores and much more. Would definitely stay here again!

Neighborhood is walkable with pleasant hills and grand trees. I have already booked another stay in August.

Emma was an excellent host she provided quick responses. The beds were clean and very comfortable overall great experience and would definitely stay here again when visiting Pullman. Thanks Emma!

Emma was responsive prior to our trip when we had lots of questions. At check-in, she wrote a sweet handwritten card. The house was quaint, I loved mix of modern and old style. Our trip way too fast for us to enjoy it all!

Beautiful updated home that honored the historical features. Rare find of two baths. Unique shower room with both baths having stunning tile. Spacious kitchen with everything you need. Would absolutely stay there again. Location was so close to some of our favorite restaurants.

Absolutely wonderful home, location and host. Every need was thought of and we felt right at home. Enjoyed the comfy beds and luxurious bedding. Didn’t want to leave so extended our stay. Response time from Emma was nearly immediate. Highly recommend.

This is a wonderful home in super convenient location, walkable to everything! Nice quiet neighborhood. Every aspect of the home surpassed my expectations. The kitchen was fully stocked and we felt very welcome and taken care of. Emma is amazing! Highly recommend.
Our stay at Emma’s place was great! Comfortable and clean.
Great stay! We even arrived a day earlier then communicated and Emma was so sweet and accommodating. Super cute house, we will definitely be back!

This was a great home for a weekend trip for a group of WSU moms. The house is adorable, beds were very comfortable, kitchen is well stocked, and location is perfect for walking to restaurants and shops. In all, it is a great place to stay!

Amazing place! We were in town to take a tour of Washington state university and this place was the perfect location. The house was clean and very spacious. The balcony provided a nice view of the town and the campus. I highly recommend others to stay here when visiting Pullman.

We had a great stay at Emma’s! The home was very clean and had just exactly what you’re want and need for a lovely stay. Highly recommend this spot for your Pullman stay!

Emma communicated extremely well prior, during and after our stay. All descriptions are spot on. We had absolutely everything we needed for our stay. This house is adorable, comfortable and close to everything. The beds were super comfortable. She really thought of everything. Can’t wait to stay there again.

Everything was as prefect as it seemed online. Emma was the most thoughtful and gracious host. The home was super clean and so very comfortable. We are definitely looking forward to staying at Emma’s again! GO Cougs

This place was perfect! It’s a very cute, nicely updated house right in the heart of downtown Pullman and exactly where you want to be if you’re visiting WSU. Such a fantastic spot! So cute and comfy. Emma went out of her way to help us with anything we needed, which wasn't much because she has thought of everything. The photos don't do it justice and very well priced too. Would love to stay again.

Loved the comfortable bed in the master / upstairs bedroom. The dining table is large and round. Enjoyed sitting around the table for dinner with my kids. We will defiantly stay here again when we visit Pullman. Emma was a great host.
Very responsive and communicative host. I would stay here again.
The place was super quaint and clean. Older house but well laid out and clean. Walkable to downtown coffee shops, and restaurants.

Also should mention you can walk to local coffee shops and restaurants as well.

Very convenient location only a couple blocks from downtown restaurants. The house was beautiful. Loved the linen sheets and the kitchen was well equipped with everything you need to cook. Emma was an excellent host!
Emma’s place is exactly as advertised. All the kitchen appliances/cooking equipment and sharp knives! Would definitely stay again. Thanks Emma!
Emma is a great host. Super location, cozy and impeccably clean. Would 100% recommend staying here.

We stayed here for Apple Cup weekend and honestly could not ask for a better location. We walked downtown for food and ice cream. This is an older house, but the owner has done quite a bit of updating and the house is super cozy and perfect for football weekends. We will definitely look here first when returning to Pullman.
Awesome host, beautiful home, and great location. It was the perfect experience and would definitely stay again.
Emma’s place is great. Lots of character and looks recently remodeled. Very quiet as well.
Stayed for family weekend, and close enough for us to walk to the game/campus and right near downtown area. A charming house that made perfect home base for the weekend!
This place is a gem! Walkable location, super clean and cozy. Emma is a great host.

Idah is an attentive host and quick to respond. ❤️ I had a restful sleep each night of my stay, the cozy space had everything I needed, and the peace and quiet were just what I needed. Would stay here again!

Cozy place with everything you need, a few minutes from campus.

enjoyed the stay. worked for an overnight game weekend.
